title: Review Customer Onboarding Process
description: An operational auditor maps the customer onboarding process to identify delays and improve customer satisfaction.

tasks.description: Interview sales, operations, and customer support staff to create a detailed process map of the entire onboarding journey.
tasks.expected_outcome: A visual process map is created.

tasks.description: Analyze the process map to identify bottlenecks, such as the manual handoff between the sales and operations teams.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor identifies a key delay in the process.

tasks.description: Recommend automating the handoff process by integrating the CRM and the operations management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: A specific, actionable recommendation for process improvement is made.
